'''1.17 Pre-release 5''' (known as '''1.17-pre5''' in the launcher) is the fifth and final pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.17]], released on June 3, 2021,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-17-pre-release-2|Minecraft 1.17 Pre-Release 5|June 3, 2021}}</ref> which fixed bugs.
